resources.string:
Hi, my name is Aleks. 

I love finish. 

The kind that is alive and swins around ina an aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariuns and also a river. 
nnI like eating fish, too.Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish - not so much. 
And even less somethings, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon with my hands. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to make your own aquarium. 
You should ask someone else abbout fishing, thoug.
